text: (Rántí) nígbà tí Èṣù ṣe iṣẹ́ wọn ní ọ̀ṣọ́ fún wọn, ó sì wí pé: “Kò sí ẹni tí ó máa borí yín lónìí nínú àwọn ènìyàn. Dájúdájú èmi ni aládùúgbò yín.” Ṣùgbọ́n nígbà tí àwọn ìjọ ogun méjèèjì fojú kanra wọn, ó padà sẹ́yìn, ó sì fẹsẹ̀ fẹ́ẹ, ó wí pé: "Dájúdájú èmi ti yọwọ́-yọsẹ̀ nínú ọ̀rọ̀ yín. Dájúdájú èmi ń rí ohun tí ẹ̀yin kò rí. Èmi ń pàyà Allāhu. Allāhu sì le níbi ìyà
